mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cs_task (taskId,order_asset_Id,execute_time,status,group_flag,remarks, engineIP,taskProgress,currentUrl,begin_time,end_time,scanTime, issueCount,requestCount,urlCount,averResponse, averSendCount,sendBytes,receiveBytes,websoc,orderTaskId) VALUES(#{taskId}, #{order_asset_Id} , #{execute_time},#{status},#{group_flag}, #{remarks},#{engineIP},#{taskProgress},#{currentUrl},#{begin_time},#{end_time},#{scanTime}, #{issueCount},#{requestCount},#{urlCount},#{averResponse},#{averSendCount},#{sendBytes},#{receiveBytes},#{websoc},#{orderTaskId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status=#{status}, engineIP=#{engineIP}, taskProgress=#{taskProgress}, currentUrl=#{currentUrl}, execute_time=#{execute_time}, group_flag=#{group_flag}, begin_time=#{begin_time}, end_time=#{end_time}, scanTime=#{scanTime}, issueCount=#{issueCount}, requestCount=#{requestCount}, urlCount=#{urlCount}, averResponse=#{averResponse}, averSendCount=#{averSendCount}, sendBytes=#{sendBytes}, receiveBytes=#{receiveBytes}
mapper.select: select distinct oa.scan_type,oa.orderId from cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa where t.order_asset_id = oa.id and t.order_asset_id = #{order_asset_Id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cs_taskwarn (id,cat1,cat2,name,severity,rule,ct,app_p,tran_p,url,msg,task_id,warn_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{cat1} , #{cat2},#{name},#{severity},#{rule},#{ct},#{app_p},#{tran_p},#{url},#{msg},#{task_id},#{warn_time}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cat1=#{cat1}, cat2=#{cat2}, name=#{name}, severity=#{severity}, rule=#{rule}, ct=#{ct}, app_p=#{app_p}, tran_p=#{tran_p}, url=#{url}, msg=#{msg}, task_id=#{task_id}, warn_time=#{warn_time}
